Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Pure Neroli (Orange Blossom) Hydrosol

Directions: Mist face and neck (avoiding eyes) after cleansing skin with one of our gentle all natural soap bars. After applying toner, apply an all natural face moisturizer, such as our Superfruit & Jasmine Antioxidant Face Cream or our Neem Healing Oil.
